subject: Attention: Beneficiary,
body:
Attention: Beneficiary,
I am writing to inform you about your fund transfer, my office has noticed that you are yet to receive your fund transfer and the paying bank has not sent your transfer complete copy report.
I would like to know your reason and why you have not completed your fund transfer to your account up till now, if there is anything causing you delay or difficulty in completing your  transfer, please let me know so that we will know how to help you and complete your fund transfer as soon as possible.
I am waiting to hear from you soon
Thank you
Yours sincerely
Boss Mustafa
Funds Transfer Alliance, LLC

subject: Re: Attention: Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Boss Mustafa,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your concern about the fund transfer. To be honest, I'm not quite sure what could be causing the delay. Could you perhaps provide more details about this fund transfer? Like when was it initiated and from which bank?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Maryann

subject: Re: Attention: Beneficiary,
body:
Attention: Maryann,

I am writing in receipt of your mail, I have received your mail and the
content in it. The fund transfer has been initiated, and to be transferred
to you from the year 2021; your fund transfer title inheritance fund
transfer from United States bank SunTrust bank. the total amount of the
transfer is $15.3M, due the bank took over your the transfer from the
States treasury after the delay the fund transfer have experience in the
past years, my office are working with the United States foreign fund
transfer to make sure that all delayed fund is transfer to all their
beneficiaries without any delay of such again.

This is why I contacted you to know why your fund transfer is being
delayed, to check what the delay might be, we have to cross check all
documents related to your fund transfer since you cannot specify the course
of the delay. Be rest assured that your fund transfer will be successful in
your favor, to proceed’ send me your full name and contact telephone/ home
address with the account details where you want your fund to be transferred
to in your country/states. with an identification card of yours attached in
your next mail.

I hope that you understand me.

Waiting to hear from you as soon as possible
Best regards

Boss Mustafa

subject: Re: Attention: Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Maryann,

How are you doing today, hope well? I have been waiting to hear from you
and I hope that you receive my response I sent you last week.

Get back to me as soon as possible so that we can proceed with your fund
transfer to your account.

Waiting
Best regards

Boss Mustafa

subject: Re: Attention: Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Boss Mustafa,

I'm doing well, thank you for asking. I hope you're doing great too. I must have missed your previous message, could you please elaborate on the fund transfer you mentioned? How did this come about?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Maryann

subject: Re: Attention: Beneficiary, Maryann... This is the previous mail I sent you
body:

subject: Re: Attention: Beneficiary, Maryann... This is the previous mail I sent you
body:
Hello Boss Mustafa,

Thank you for your prompt response and the detailed explanation about the fund transfer. It's quite interesting to know that such a process is in place. I'm curious, how does this whole fund transfer system work? And why was there a delay in the first place?

I'm also wondering, what role does the United States foreign fund transfer play in this? Are they responsible for ensuring all delayed funds are transferred without any further delays?

I appreciate your assurance about the successful completion of my fund transfer. However, I would like to understand more about this process before proceeding further.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Maryann

subject: Re: Attention: Beneficiary, Maryann... This is the previous mail I sent you
body:
My dear friend Maryann,

I am writing in receipt of your mail, thank you for your soonest response,
the fund transfer will be a bank to bank wire transfer to your account as
soon as your details is submitted to the paying bank with out any more
delay because we are going to make sure that all the legal documents
follows due process for smooth wire transfer so that the transfer will not
experience delay again. Non proper documentation can also be the cause of
the find transfer delay and that we have worked on.

For safety reasons and to make sure that fund transfer is not mixed up, the
States treasury took the fund security responsibility to themselves until
when my office is employed to facilitate the smooth transfer of all funds
to their beneficiaries and to make sure no any delay again.

To proceed with your fund transfer, my office will need your total
corporation to work things out easily, like I said in my previous mail the
total sum of $15.3M is what you will receive in your account, I also
explained more in that mail too. To proceed with your fund transfer, send
me your full name. Occupation and contact address/ your telephone number
and working identification card of any kind. Send the account details where
you want your fund to be transferred to in your country/states, the account
must be a dollar account. With this we can proceed with your fund transfer
immediately.

I hope that you understand me

Waiting to hear from you as soon as possible
Best regards
Boss Mustafa

subject: Re: Attention: Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Boss Mustafa,

Thank you for your email and the detailed explanation about the fund transfer. It's really interesting to know that there are such processes in place to ensure delayed funds are transferred without any further delay.

I'm curious, though, how did my name come up in this? I mean, I don't remember initiating any fund transfers. Could there be a mix-up somewhere?

Also, could you please explain more about the role of the United States foreign fund transfer in this process? How do they work with your office to expedite these transfers?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Maryann

subject: Re: Attention: Beneficiary, Maryann... This is the previous mail I sent you
body:
Hello Boss Mustafa,

Thank you for your detailed explanation about the fund transfer process. It's quite interesting to learn how these things work, especially with all the legal documents and processes involved.

I'm curious though, why does the account need to be a dollar account? Is it not possible to convert the funds into my local currency during the transfer process? Also, could you please explain more about what you mean by "working card of any kind"?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Maryann

subject: Re: Attention: Beneficiary, Maryann... This is the previous mail I sent you
body:
My dear friend Maryann,

I am writing in receipt of your mail, your email address was on the fund
transfer information and that is reason why I contacted you for the fund
transfer and if you can remember from my very first mail to you, I ask why
have you not completed your fund transfer to your account, that I want to
know so that we can see how we can help you complete your fund transfer
with any more delayed.

Like I said, the fund transfer is an inheritance fund, the files we have in
my office are all in inheritance and contract funds files, most of this
file has been long delayed for years now. $15.3M inheritance fund transfer
is in your information with me in my office that is why I contacted you.

The State's foreign fund transfer and my office, Funds Transfer Alliance,
LLC, work in conjunction for one goal; to achieve and make sure that all
foreign fund transfer delayed is being transferred legally to their
beneficiaries.

The fund can be converted by the paying bank and that is for the paying
bank and the receiving partner bank to make provision for that, you also
have to inform this office about your local currency so that it will be
included in your documentation.

I said. (To proceed with your fund transfer, send me your full name.
Occupation and contact address/ your telephone number and working
identification card of any kind.) I hope that I have clarified all you ask
from me.

Waiting to hear from you soon
Best regards
Boss Mustafa

subject: Re: Attention: Beneficiary, Maryann... This is the previous mail I sent you
body:
Hello Boss Mustafa,

Thank you for reaching out and explaining the situation to me. I must say, it's quite an interesting scenario. However, I'm a bit confused about some parts of your message.

You mentioned something about a fund transfer that hasn't been completed yet. Could you please elaborate on this? What kind of fund are we talking about here?

Also, you mentioned that my email address was on the fund transfer. How did my email address end up there? I don't recall being involved in any such transactions.

I'm also curious about the role of Funds Transfer Alliance, LLC in this process. Could you explain more about what they do?

Lastly, you asked for my full name, occupation, contact address, telephone number and working card of any kind. While I understand that these details might be necessary for the process, could you clarify why exactly they are needed?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Maryann

subject: Re: Attention: Beneficiary, Maryann... This is the previous mail I sent you
body:
My dear friend Maryann,

I believe that I have answered your question to the best of my knowledge; I
have told you the duties and what we stand for in this transaction in my
mails. I am an employee and my job is to contact all files before me to
know the reason they have not received their funds so that we can
facilitate their fund delivery. This fund is an inheritance fund and I have
told you all about the fund and how it is in your favor, it is very easy if
you are not the real beneficiary, tell me so that we will close the fund
transfer file and declare the fund abandoned.
Best regards

Boss Mustafa

subject: Re: Attention: Beneficiary, Maryann... This is the previous mail I sent you
body:
Hello Boss Mustafa,

Thank you for your detailed explanation. I appreciate your efforts in ensuring that the funds reach their rightful owner. It's really commendable what you do.

I'm curious, how does this process usually work? And how long does it typically take for the funds to be transferred?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Maryann

subject: Re: Attention: Beneficiary, Maryann... This is the previous mail I sent you
body:
Hello Maryann

How does it work?  As normal fund wire transfer

How long will it take? As soon as the corresponding paying bank receives
you complete information from my office.

Boss Mustafa

subject: Re: Attention: Beneficiary, Maryann... This is the previous mail I sent you
body:
Hello Boss Mustafa,

Thank you for your quick response. I'm really interested in understanding more about this process. Could you please explain a bit more about how the normal fund wire transfer works? And when you say "as soon as the paying bank receives your complete from my office", could you clarify what exactly they need to receive?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Maryann
